ai-tha-ap354:1.4_0: I took a floor covering for the park.
ai-tha-ap354:2.4_0: sat down on the seat spread out.
ai-tha-ap354:3.2_0: a great sacrifice, having understood the Greatly.
ai-tha-ap354:3.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap354:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap354:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Paliya.
ai-tha-ap354:7.1_0: Seeing the second during the Elder (which was),
